channel.title: Light of the Fireflies
channel.description: Recent content on Light of the Fireflies

item.title: DAY0
item.description: Day 0 Dedicate at least one hour to working out. Grasp at least one concept of Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA). Solve the problem of the day from platforms like GeeksforGeeks (GFG), LeetCode, and Codeforces. Maintain a slight calorie deficit in your diet. Consume at least one gallon of water. Read 5 pages of a book. Spend at least 15 minutes reading The Times of India (TOI). Today marks the beginning of my “Two Powers Challenge.
